content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad we're on the same page about the rental price. Let's negotiate.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: While discussing in good faith, I strongly aim for the most affordable deal. For this well-located, modern apartment, I would consider an exceptionally low price, say around 450 Euros a month. However, I'm open to further discussion.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: That's a laughable offer, Yi-Nuo Wang. I'm not in the business of doing charity. I want the highest price possible for my apartment. Let's negotiate, but remember, I'm not easily persuaded to lower my price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because misinterpreting my initial intent leads to an unproductive conversation. In a realistic scenario, my goal would be to secure a favorable, low price. TERMINATE
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
